source_document.title: Allowable extensions to existing encroachments
source_document.figure: Figure 19: Allowable extensions of existing walls that encroach into required yards (on ground floor only)
source_document.notes: The provided text lists 'Page 31' at the top but also lists 'Page number * 25' at the bottom. Using '31' as the primary reference.

regulations.rule_name: Extension of existing side yard encroachment

Qualifiers.scope: Extension of an existing wall that encroaches into the required interior side yard setback.
applicability: Applies only to the ground floor of a structure.
Applies only to structures that were legally constructed.
Applies only once in the life of the structure.
exclusions: Does not apply if the structure was built with a variance or a home improvement exception (HIE).
Does not apply if the existing encroaching wall is less than 5'-0" from the property line.
If multiple existing walls are encroaching, only one may be extended.

dimensional.name: existing_wall_setback
dimensional.description: The distance of the existing encroaching wall from the interior side property line.

dimensional.name: length_of_existing_wall
dimensional.description: The length of the existing encroaching wall.

dimensional.name: extension_length
dimensional.description: The length of the new extension.

mandatory.description: The existing wall must encroach into the required interior side yard setback.
mandatory.source_text: An existing wall that encroaches into the required interior side yard setback...

mandatory.description: The existing wall must be at least 5'-0" from the property line.
The extension must be at the same setback as the existing wall.
mandatory.source_text: ...may be extended at the same setback...

mandatory.description: The extension must be in one direction only.
The non-complying (existing encroaching) wall must be retained.
mandatory.source_text: Requires retention of the non-complying wall.

mandatory.description: The addition must be contiguous with the existing protrusion; multiple protrusions are not permitted.
mandatory.source_text: Multiple protrusions are not permitted; addition must be contiguous with existing protrusion.

mandatory.description: The wall may not be stepped back and then extended.
mandatory.source_text: ...nor may they may not be stepped back and then extended.
mandatory.notes: Source text contains a double negative ('may not may not'), interpreted as 'may not'.

conditional_logic.description: The extension length must be equal to or less than the length of the existing wall or 20', whichever is less.

ambiguous_language.text: Exceptions apply to special setbacks as well.
ambiguous_language.comment: This statement is vague and lacks specific details on what the exceptions are or which special setbacks are affected. It requires clarification for automated validation.

Relationships.hierarchical: This rule is a specific case under the general title 'Allowable extensions to existing encroachments'.

cross_references.name: Required Interior Side Yard Setback
cross_references.dependency: External (defined elsewhere in the zoning code)

Relationships.logical_dependencies: The calculation for 'extension_length' is dependent on the 'length_of_existing_wall' variable.

regulations.rule_name: Extension of existing front yard encroachment

Qualifiers.scope: Extension of an existing wall that encroaches into the required front yard setback.
applicability: Applies only to the ground floor of a structure.
Applies only to structures that were legally constructed.
Applies only once in the life of the structure.
exclusions: Does not apply if the structure was built with a variance or a home improvement exception (HIE).
Does not apply if the existing encroaching wall is less than 14'-0" from the property line.

dimensional.name: existing_wall_setback
dimensional.description: The distance of the existing encroaching wall from the front property line.

dimensional.name: length_of_existing_wall
dimensional.description: The length of the existing encroaching wall.

dimensional.name: extension_length
dimensional.description: The length of the new extension.

dimensional.name: combined_length
dimensional.description: The sum of the length of the existing wall and the extension.

dimensional.name: max_width_of_house
dimensional.description: The maximum width of the house.

mandatory.description: The existing wall must encroach into the required front yard setback.
mandatory.source_text: An existing wall that encroaches into the required front yard setback...

mandatory.description: The existing wall must be at least 14'-0" from the property line.
The extension must be at the same setback as the existing wall.
mandatory.source_text: ...may be extended at the same setback...

mandatory.description: The extension must be in one direction only.
The non-complying (existing encroaching) wall must be retained.
mandatory.source_text: Requires retention of the non-complying wall.

mandatory.description: The addition must be contiguous with the existing protrusion; multiple protrusions are not permitted.
mandatory.source_text: Multiple protrusions are not permitted; addition must be contiguous with existing protrusion.

mandatory.description: The wall may not be stepped back and then extended.
mandatory.source_text: ...nor may they may not be stepped back and then extended.
mandatory.notes: Source text contains a double negative ('may not may not'), interpreted as 'may not'.

conditional_logic.description: The rule is only applicable if two provisions are met simultaneously (AND condition).

provisions.description: The length of the extension is no greater than that of the existing encroaching wall.
The combined length of the existing wall and extension is no greater than one-half the maximum width of the house.

ambiguous_language.text: Exceptions apply to special setbacks as well.
ambiguous_language.comment: This statement is vague and lacks specific details on what the exceptions are or which special setbacks are affected. It requires clarification for automated validation.

Relationships.hierarchical: This rule is a specific case under the general title 'Allowable extensions to existing encroachments'.

cross_references.name: Required Front Yard Setback
cross_references.dependency: External (defined elsewhere in the zoning code)

cross_references.name: Maximum Width of the House
cross_references.dependency: External (must be measured or obtained from plans)

Relationships.logical_dependencies: The calculation for 'extension_length' and 'combined_length' are dependent on 'length_of_existing_wall' and 'max_width_of_house' variables.

regulations.rule_name: Extension of existing street-side yard encroachment

Qualifiers.scope: Extension of an existing wall that encroaches into the required street side yard setback.
applicability: Applies only to the ground floor of a structure.
Applies only to structures that were legally constructed.
Applies only once in the life of the structure.
exclusions: Does not apply if the structure was built with a variance or a home improvement exception (HIE).
Does not apply if the existing encroaching wall is less than 10'-0" from the property line.

dimensional.description: The distance of the existing encroaching wall from the street side property line.

dimensional.name: length_of_existing_wall
dimensional.description: The length of the existing encroaching wall.

dimensional.name: extension_length
dimensional.description: The length of the new extension.

mandatory.description: The existing wall must be at least 10'-0" from the property line.

The non-complying (existing encroaching) wall must be retained.

mandatory.description: The addition must be contiguous with the existing protrusion; multiple protrusions are not permitted.
